(I'm taking back control of Punch and Counter Punch from Yanshosh now)

Punch/Counter Punch:


Punch got far away from the other Predacons, activating his inner monologue 
comm. unit.  In his Inner M. comm., his voice sounded like Counter Punch's, 
and the transmission was directed to the Predacon base on a secure channel.

~Everyone in the Predacon base, this is your spy, Counter Punch.  A few 
Maximals are heading back for their base from the Alliance baes.  If you 
hurry, you can intercept them.  When I see Predacon forces engaging them, I 
will attack from behind~
